Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Northbound Reroute near Cottage Grove/75th
ShortDescription: Northbound 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 76th, Greenwood and South Chicago: due to, street blockage near Cottage Grove/75th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 76th, Greenwood, South Chicago and over regular route, due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/75th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #82 Kimball/Homan Temporary Reroute at Lawndale/26th
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball/Homan buses are rerouted via Lawndale, 26th, Central Park, 31st, then resume their normal route on Homan due to street blockage near Lawndale/26th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#82 Kimball/Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Lawndale, 26th, Central Park, 31st, then resume their normal route on Homan due to street blockage near Lawndale/26th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Rosemont
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Devon, Sheridan and Granville: due to, police activity near Broadway/Rosemont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Devon, Sheridan, Granville, then resume their normal route at Broadway, due to police activity near Broadway/Rosemont.

 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at Grand
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at Grand due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at Grand due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
